fields.name: DefaultLoad
fields.description: Used only for Stateless services. The default amount of load, as a number, that this service creates for this metric.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: The name of the metric. If the service chooses to report load during runtime, the load metric name should match the name that is specified in Name exactly. Note that metric names are case sensitive.

fields.name: PrimaryDefaultLoad
fields.description: Used only for Stateful services. The default amount of load, as a number, that this service creates for this metric when it is a Primary replica.

fields.name: SecondaryDefaultLoad
fields.description: Used only for Stateful services. The default amount of load, as a number, that this service creates for this metric when it is a Secondary replica.

fields.name: Weight
fields.description: The service load metric relative weight, compared to other metrics configured for this service, as a number.
